subject: British Open (Golf)
Golf
lead_paragraph: Played on windswept courses that are linked to the sea, the British Open is often an exercise in hitting low, running shots, while other PGA Tour events call for high shots that land softly.
snippet: Played on windswept courses that are linked to the sea, the British Open is often an exercise in hitting low, running shots, while other PGA Tour events call for high shots that land softly.
